data.title: Michael D. Bell Obituary 2018
data.meta_description: Michael D. Bell, 55, of New Philadelphia died Saturday, January 13, 2018 after injuries sustained in a car accident.Born on November 20, 1962 in Dover he was a son of the late D...
data.text:
Michael D. Bell, 55, of New Philadelphia died Saturday, January 13, 2018 after injuries sustained in a car accident.

Born on November 20, 1962 in Dover he was a son of the late David Bell and Mary Kay Francis. Mike was also preceded in death by his brother, Greg Bell and father in law, Andy Struhar.

He graduated in 1981 from Arcadia High school and then joined the United States Navy. Following his discharge, he became a truck driver, and was currently driving for B&L Trucking in Winesburg. Mike loved the outdoors, especially hunting and fishing.

He is survived by his wife of 25 years, Susan Struhar Bell; children, Erin, Jeremy and Michael Bell II all of New Philadelphia; sister, Shelly (Larry) Litman of Dennison; half-brothers, Chris (Shawn) Kemper, Larry Kohler; half-sisters, Linda Greene, Tanya Bell; step-sisters, Lisa (Rick) Bustillo and Teresa (Dave) Geer; mother in law, Clara Struhar and his step-mother, Michelle Bell.

Cremation has been entrusted to the Toland-Herzig Funeral Home and Crematory at Dover. There are no services or calling hours. Those wishing to express their fondest memories of Mike may do so by visiting the online obituaries link on the funeral homes website.

Memorial contributions may be made to the Tuscarawas County Humane Society.
